name: 黃秀英
objective: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
schedule:
1　　Syllabus and Introduction (Ch1)
2　　One Dimensional Elements and Computational Procedures (Ch2)
3　　Basic Elements (Ch3)
4　　Formulation Techniques: Variational Methods (Ch4)
5　　Formulation Techniques: Galerkin and Other Weighted Residual Methods (Ch5)
6　　Isoparametric Elements (Ch6)
7　　Isoparametric Triangles and Tetrahedra (Ch7)
8　　Coordinate Transformation and Selected Analysis Options (Ch8), Define the semester project topics.  Report outline due next week
9　　Review & Midterm Exam
10　　Error Estimation and Convergence (Ch9), Student Midterm Exam Evaluation
11　　Modeling Considerations and Software Use (Ch10)
12　　Finite Elements in Structural Dynamics and Vibrations (Ch11)
13　　Heat Transfer and Selected Fluid Problems (Ch12)
14　　Constraints: Penalty Forms, Locking, and Constraint Counting (Ch13) & Solids of Revolution (Ch14)
15　　Plate Bending (Ch15) & Shells (Ch16)
16　　Nonlinearity: An Introduction (Ch17)
17　　Project Presentation
18　　Class Review & Final Exam
